title: Privacy Policy
section1_intro: We, the operators of this website, take the protection of your personal data very seriously. Personal data refers to all information that identifies you as an individual. This Privacy Policy explains what data we collect, how we use it, and what rights you have under the GDPR and the German Federal Data Protection Act (BDSG).
section1_definition: Personal data includes all information relating to an identified or identifiable natural person.
section2_point1: IP address, browser type and version, operating system
section2_point2: Date and time of access, visited pages
section2_point5: Interactions with Google services (Maps, YouTube, reCAPTCHA)
section3_point1: Art. 6(1)(a) GDPR – Consent: e.g. for analytics or newsletters.
section3_point2: Art. 6(1)(b) GDPR – Contract performance: for handling inquiries or orders.
section3_point3: Art. 6(1)(c) GDPR – Legal obligation: for retention or reporting duties.
section3_point4: Art. 6(1)(f) GDPR – Legitimate interests: to maintain functionality, security, or optimize our services.
section4_point1: Web hosting and email services (within the EU)
section4_point2: Google Analytics and YouTube (Google LLC, USA)
section4_point3: Google Maps API, reCAPTCHA, and Google Web Fonts
section4_note: Data transfers to third countries (e.g., the USA) occur only under EU Standard Contractual Clauses or comparable safeguards according to Art. 46 GDPR.
section5_text: Personal data is retained only as long as necessary for its intended purpose or as required by law. Afterward, it is deleted or anonymized in accordance with Art. 17 GDPR.
section6_point3: Erasure ('right to be forgotten', Art. 17 GDPR)
section6_point7: Complaint to a supervisory authority (Art. 77 GDPR) – Bavarian State Office for Data Protection Supervision (BayLDA), Promenade 18, 91522 Ansbach, Germany – www.lda.bayern.de
section7_text: Our website uses cookies for essential, analytical, and performance purposes. Non-essential cookies are activated only with your consent, which you can change or withdraw at any time.
section8_point1: Google Analytics – Used to analyze user behavior; IP anonymization is enabled. Opt-out available via Google Analytics Opt-out.
section8_point2: YouTube – Embedded videos use YouTube iFrame. Log out of your account to prevent association with your profile.
section8_point3: Google Maps – When viewing maps, IP and location data are transmitted to Google. Use is based on legitimate interests for displaying locations.
section8_point4: Google reCAPTCHA – Used to prevent spam. IP and interaction data are sent to Google for verification.
section8_point5: Google Web Fonts – Ensures consistent font display; your IP address may be transmitted to Google servers.
section9_text: We implement technical and organizational measures to protect your data from loss, manipulation, or unauthorized access.
section10_text: This Privacy Policy is reviewed regularly. The latest version is always available at www.chipglobe.com/privacy.
